content: this little bat is in need of a hat this free pattern is part of a new project i have created where crochet pattern creators can collaborate and make bat hats packs to fit this little bat as each pack is released i will make a bit of a master-list below to keep track of them this is a free pattern and i and hopefully many other pattern creators will be regularly releasing different paid bat hats pattern packs which will include different hats for the bat to wear these pattern packs will help to transform this bat into a blind box item think smiskis or sonny angels which will be perfect for selling at market stalls or online all you ll need to do is make boxes or bags for your bats to be sold in and include photos of the different possible bats your customers may find in their box they would also be perfect for market stall claw machines where customers can try to pick up the bat with the hat they want this pattern has both written step-by-step instructions and photos this pattern is created for people with an intermediate level of knowledge of crochet and requires some hand sewing this pattern uses us crochet terms and is in english i have made this pattern as simple and as quick to make as possible it should take approximately one hour to complete the images in this pattern are of a bat i made out of 4 seasons marvel 8ply yarn using a 3 5mm hook if you make a bat hats pattern pack please email me a link to it @ bellle crochet@gmail com and i ll add it to the list bat hats link masterlist - halloween bat hats - https //ravel me/halloween-bat-hats - spring bat hats - https //ravel me/spring-bat-hats if you have any questions regarding the pattern please don t hesitate to contact me and i will be happy to help thank you for supporting a small crochet business and keep an eye out for future pattern releases annabelle ©belle essie crochet annabelle created march 2025 this pattern is copyrighted and is for personal use only this pattern cannot be copied shared or sold in any way physical products made from this pattern can be sold as long as the pattern creator is credited
